KeysToEntries.MiningLevelInstruction: Mine ore, clay or stone, or gather stones from the floor to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.WoodcuttingLevelInstruction: Chop down trees, tear up saplings or collect logs from the floor to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.ArtisanLevelInstruction: Craft new weapons, armour or tools to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.ConstructionLevelInstruction: Build new structures to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.AttackLevelInstruction: Defeat enemies with melee weapons to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.MagicLevelInstruction: Defeat enemies with magic to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.RangedLevelInstruction: Defeat enemies with ranged weapons to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.RunecraftingLevelInstruction: Gather Rune Essence and craft Runes to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.CookingLevelInstruction: Cook meals to level this skill.
KeysToEntries.FarmingLevelInstruction: Grow crops to level this skill.
